body.name: Xgody X60 4G LTE Android Phone, 6 Inches QHD Waterdrop Screen Unlocked Cell Phone, 2GB RAM+16GB ROM, Dual Sim Slots Smartphone, 5MP+5MP Camera, Facial Unlock, 3000mAh Mobile Phones (Blue-3)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 37 mins
features: 【Chic Phone with A Perfect Grip Size】The upgraded X60 unlock phone is meticulously designed for ergonomic comfort, featuring an 18:9 aspect ratio and an ultra-slim 0.33-inch thickness. With a 6-inch screen size, android phone offers a pleasant user experience for activities such as watching short videos or reading files. Furthermore, this unlocked smartphone showcases a stylish and distinctive five-hole rear camera design, combining practicality with a fashionable edge.

【 4G LTE Dual Sim Unlocked Cell Phones 】The X60 unlocked android phone features three separate card slots, accommodating 1 Nano SIM card, 1 Micro SIM card, and 1 SD card (none included), supporting 4G LTE networks. Additionally, the X60 mobile phone utilizes advanced memory compatibility technology, allowing the SD card to expand up to 256GB. This enables you to effortlessly store photos, documents, download music and movies, and install applications according to your preferences.

【2GB RAM+16GB ROM & Stable Android 9 System】The Xgody X60 unlocked phone boasts 2GB of RAM and 16GB of internal storage, operating on the dependable Android 9 system. These enhanced specifications guarantee a seamless visual experience and swift response times, whether you're watching movies, engaging in video chats, or multitasking with various apps. With a stable Android 9 system, this newly cheap phone ensures a smoother overall user experience.

【Removable battery for added convenience】The X60 unlocked smartphone is equipped with a 3000mAh battery and cutting-edge ultra-long standby technology. With this feature, a single daily charge is sufficient to power you through the entire day, ensuring you stay connected. Moreover, this 6-inch smart phone comes with a removable battery, offering the convenience of easy replacement if needed, ultimately saving you on replacement costs.

【5+5MP Camera & Face Unlock】The X60 unlocked cell phone is a phone with 5+5MP front/ rear cameras, allowing you to easily capture clear portraits and documents anytime, anywhere. The unlocked smartphone can meet your camera needs in daily life and work. In addition, the X60 cell phones unlocked also supports face recognition unlock, which can securely protect your privacy. Even if the phone is lost, you don't have to worry about your personal information being leaked. Let the X60 phone be your capable assistant.

【NOTE】The X60 android phone unlocked is a 4G LTE unlocked device designed to function seamlessly with T-Mobile and AT&T networks, as well as their MVNO networks. Kindly be aware that a SIM card is not included. For detailed information regarding compatibility with your carrier's program, we recommend checking directly with them. Please note that this phone is not compatible with Cricket, Verizon, or CDMA networks such as Sprint and Boost Mobile.

【Experienced customer support team】If you encounter any challenges while using our products, feel free to reach out to us. Our professional after-sales team is committed to promptly reviewing your concerns within 12 hours and providing a solution within 24 hours. Your satisfaction is our priority.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features of XGODY Smartphone X60 Android 9 System: The system is stable and easy to operate.4G LTE high-speed Internet access speed is more than 20 times higher than that of 3G mobile phones.The 6 inch body with waterdrop screen of a screen ratio of 92%, providing a wide field of vision to enjoying video and reading.ROM 16GB & RAM 2GB & MTK6737 Ouad-Core Processor, enough for you to easily switch apps in your daily life.Smart face ID, compared to fingerprint unlocking, free your hands, faster and safer.5MP + 5MP Camera + 256GB memory card expansion (no included), it is convenient for you to record the moments of your life.3000mAH large battery: the video playback time is about 8 hours, the music playback time is about 15 hours, the 4G Internet access is 20 hours, and the standby time is more than 24 hours, no need to worry about power issues throughout the day.
The upgraded X60 is ergonomically designed, practical and stylish.

The high cost-effect smartphone X60 has 2GB RAM, it is capable of multitasking without delay, 16GB ROM is enough to install popular apps, music, videos. Equipped with MTK6737 quad-core processor, XGODY X60 has Android 9 operating platform, allowing you to download massive APP and run smoothly.
Xgody X60 cell phone is the best choice for your first cheap mobile phone or backup phone. Its super cost-effective and simple and stylish appearance make you love it.
Gifts It can be given to friends, children, parents and employees, etc. It is the best choice for Christmas, Halloween, Valentine's Day and other festivals or daily gifts.

Q&A: Answer: Yes, but the SIM card is not included. It is 2+1 card slots design. SIM1 is for Nano, SIM2 is for Micro, and the other one is Micro SD Card (Up to 256GB expansion,does not contain). (Dual 4G is not supported, When the dual 4G SIM is in standby, only the 4G network of one of the cards can be used.). 2、Question: Does it come with a charger? Answer: Sorry, It contains a USB cable, a phone case, a user manual, Tempered film, HD film . But charger, SIM card and TF card are Not Included. 3、Question: Does XGODY X60 work with all carriers? Answer: Sorry, XGODY X60 is only applicable to AT&T and T-Mobile. Please check the frequency range of X60 for compatibility with other carriers. 4、Question: What should I do if the mobile phone cannot receive the network signal? Answer: Excluding the damage of the card slot and the incompatible Sim card, if the network signal cannot be received, you need to insert the Sim card and battery, and then close the battery back cover tightly. There is an antenna for receiving signals in the back cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ergonomic and User-Friendly
reviews.reviewText: The design is not just about aesthetics; it's also ergonomic and user-friendly. The buttons are easy to reach, and the placement of the fingerprint sensor is intuitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Backup Device
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this phone as a backup, and it has come in handy multiple times. Whenever my primary phone has issues, I switch to this one, and it performs reliably. It's a valuable backup option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim and Lightweight
reviews.reviewText: This phone's slim and lightweight design is perfect for those who prefer a device that doesn't weigh them down. It's comfortable to carry all day.
